REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2924 reute d f BC-SENTEX-<SENS>-EXTENDS 03-31 0067

TEXT.TITLE: SENTEX <SENS> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Sentex Sensing Technology Inc said it extended to April 9, 1988, from April 9, 1987, the expiration date of the warrants issued in connection with its public stock offering in April 1984. The company said that it will voluntarily withdraw the warrants from the NASDAQ system on April six, 1987, to forestall speculation on their price. Reuter
